issue.title: [R] remove dependency on withr
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5003](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5003). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is not critical to depend on `withr`, we can remove it.

comments.body:
